resources:
Quiz your friend true false next Which color do you like the most from these? Which color does your friend like the most from these? Red Yellow Green Blue What would you rather do What would your friend rather do? Eat Sleep Play video games Study You got a 85 and a math test, how do you feel? your friend got a 85 on their test, how do they feel? BEST DAY OF MY LIFE!!! kill me now. meh what test? You found a $100 bill on the ground, what do you buy? Your friend found a $100 bill on the ground, what do they buy? Save it for college clothes food video games Which class is the worst? Which class does your friend hate the most? Seniors Juniors Sophomores Freshman You have to stay after school today, why? Your friend has to stay after school, why? We came for the sports! Making up a test Nerd Team/Nerd Olympiad Missed the bus :( You lost the most valuable thing in your life, what was it? Your friend lost the most valuable thing in their life, what was it? A laptop Friends :( Homework worth 50 points Dignity Who do you spend the most time with? Who does your friend spend the most time with? A \"friend\" of the opposite gender parents The other person taking this quiz Me themselves You turn on the TV, what\'s the last thing you watched? Your friend turns on the TV, what\'s the last thing they watched? A cheesy K-drama A cartoon A reality show Game of Thrones You guys are hanging out this weekend, what would you rather do? You guys are hanging out this weekend, what would your friend rather do? LAN party Ball food Watch a movie Correct! You\'re closer than you think Wrong! Are you even friends? Will you fail to uphold personal and academic honor in the TJHSST community? Honor Code\ Forgive me Let me out! The answer you seek is........A The answer you seek is........B\ The answer you seek is........C The answer you seek is........D A B C D
back Retry Best friends Submit Once you\'re done, hand the device over to a friend!
